newsitem.title: USA: Ford to release Q1 earnings April 16.
newsitem.headline: Ford to release Q1 earnings April 16.

text.p: Ford Motor Co. said it will release its first quarter earnings on April 16 and its 1997 proxy statement on April 7.

Ford said the earnings will be released at 0730 EDT/1130 GMT on April 16, and Ford Chief Financial Officer John Devine will hold a news conference on the results at 1030 EDT/1430 GMT. The proxy statement is scheduled to be released at 1000 EDT/1400 GMT on April 7.
